languages.text: "Кажется, господин судья любит животных? Никогда бы не подумала, что у вас есть такая... добрая сторона". {n}Улыбка Мейв мягкая и грустная, впервые она смотрит на арбитра без страха.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Простите, что вмешиваюсь, господин судья, но он пожертвовал собой ради вашего спасения! А вы говорите о нем как о какой-то бездушной вещи!"
traits.speaker: FW_Lizzy

languages.text: "My lord judicator is fond of animals, is he not? I never would've thought you had a... kind side like that." {n}Maive's smile is gentle and sad. For the first time ever, she looks at Solomorne without fear.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Кажется, господин судья любит животных? Никогда бы не подумала, что у вас есть такая... добрая сторона". {n}Улыбка Мейв мягкая и грустная, впервые она смотрит на арбитра без страха.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Looks like Mr Justice is fond of animals! I never would've thought you had a... kind side like that." {n}Maive's smile is gentle and sad. This is the first time she has ever looked at the Arbitrator without fear.{/n}

"Looks like Mr Justice is fond of animals! I never would've thought you had a... kind side like that." {n}Maive's smile is gentle and sad. This is the first time she has ever looked at the Arbitrator without fear.{/n}

"It sounds like Master Justice is fond of animals! I never would've thought you had a... kind side like that." {n}Maive's smile is gentle and sad. This is the first time she has ever looked at the Arbitrator without fear.{/n}

"It sounds like Master Justice is fond of animals! I never would've thought you had a... kind side like that." {n}Maive's smile is gentle and sad. This is the first time she has ever looked at the Arbitrator without fear.{/n}

"My lord judicator is fond of animals, is he not? I never would've thought you had a... kind side like that." {n}Maive's smile is gentle and sad. For the first time ever, she looks at Solomorne without fear.{/n}

"My lord judicator is fond of animals, is he not? I never would've thought you had a... kind side like that." {n}Maive's smile is gentle and sad. For the first time ever, she looks at Solomorne without fear.{/n}

languages.text: 「裁判官様は動物がお好きなのですね。そのような…優しい一面をお持ちだとは思いませんでした」{n}メイヴの微笑みは、穏やかでどこか物悲しい。彼女がソロモーンを見るその目に、恐れの色がないのはこれが初めてだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My lord judicator is fond of animals, is he not? I never would've thought you had a... kind side like that." {n}Maive's smile is gentle and sad. For the first time ever, she looks at Solomorne without fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「裁判官様は動物がお好きなのですね。そのような…優しい一面をお持ちだとは思いませんでした」{n}メイヴの微笑みは、穏やかでどこか物悲しい。彼女がソロモーンを見るその目に、恐れの色がないのはこれが初めてだった。{/n}
「裁判官様は動物がお好きなのですね。そのような…優しい一面をお持ちだとは思いませんでした」{n}メイヴの微笑みは、穏やかでどこか物悲しい。彼女がソロモーンを見るその目に、恐れの色がないのはこれが初めてだった。{/n}

languages.text: "Sayın hâkimim hayvanları severmiş, öyle mi? Böyle nahif bir yanınız olduğunu hiç bilmezdim." {n}Maive nazikçe ve hüzünle gülümsüyor. Hayatında ilk kez Solomorne'a korkmadan bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My lord judicator is fond of animals, is he not? I never would've thought you had a... kind side like that." {n}Maive's smile is gentle and sad. For the first time ever, she looks at Solomorne without fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sayın hâkimim hayvanları severmiş, öyle mi? Böyle nahif bir yanınız olduğunu hiç bilmezdim." {n}Maive nazikçe ve hüzünle gülümsüyor. Hayatında ilk kez Solomorne'a korkmadan bakıyor.{/n}

languages.text: «Mi señor magistrado siente cariño por los animales, ¿no es así? Nunca habría imaginado que tuviera... un lado tan amable». {n}La sonrisa de Maive es tan gentil como triste. Por primera vez, mira a Solomorne sin miedo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My lord judicator is fond of animals, is he not? I never would've thought you had a... kind side like that." {n}Maive's smile is gentle and sad. For the first time ever, she looks at Solomorne without fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mi señor juez siente cariño por los animales, ¿no es así? Nunca habría imaginado que tuviera... un lado tan amable». {n}La sonrisa de Maive es tan gentil como triste. Por primera vez, mira a Solomorne sin miedo.{/n}

languages.text: “仲裁官大人，您很喜欢动物，是吗？我从没想过您居然会有……那么和善的一面。”{n}梅芙露出了温柔、哀伤的笑容，这还是她第一次毫无惧色地看着索罗蒙。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My lord judicator is fond of animals, is he not? I never would've thought you had a... kind side like that." {n}Maive's smile is gentle and sad. For the first time ever, she looks at Solomorne without fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “仲裁官大人，您很喜欢动物，是吗？我从没想过您居然会有……那么和善的一面。”{n}梅芙露出了温柔、哀伤的笑容，这还是她第一次毫无惧色地看着索罗蒙。{/n}

languages.text: « Vous aimez beaucoup les animaux, n'est-ce pas, seigneur juge ? Je n'aurais jamais cru que vous aviez... aussi bon cœur. » {n}Maive affiche un sourire attendri mâtiné de tristesse. Pour la toute première fois, elle porte sur Solomorne un regard dépourvu de crainte.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My lord judicator is fond of animals, is he not? I never would've thought you had a... kind side like that." {n}Maive's smile is gentle and sad. For the first time ever, she looks at Solomorne without fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous aimez beaucoup les animaux, n'est-ce pas, seigneur juge ? Je n'aurais jamais cru que vous aviez... aussi bon cœur. » {n}Maive affiche un sourire attendri mâtiné de tristesse. Pour la toute première fois, elle porte sur Solomorne un regard dépourvu de crainte.{/n}

languages.text: "Der ehrenwerte Judikator mag Tiere, nicht wahr? Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass Ihr eine so ... gütige Seite habt." {n}Maives Lächeln ist sanft und traurig. Zum ersten Mal sieht sie Solomorne ohne jede Furcht an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My lord judicator is fond of animals, is he not? I never would've thought you had a... kind side like that." {n}Maive's smile is gentle and sad. For the first time ever, she looks at Solomorne without fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Der ehrenwerte Richter mag Tiere, nicht wahr? Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass Ihr eine so ... gütige Seite habt." {n}Maives Lächeln ist sanft und traurig. Zum ersten Mal sieht sie Solomorne ohne jede Furcht an.{/n}
